Gisborne District Council applies for another enforcement order against Aratu Forests https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-district-council-applies-for-another-enforcement-order-against-aratu-forests/Y5POZ6IEFZHJXL46OQ5HJ3WOKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-district-council-applies-for-another-enforcement-order-against-aratu-forests/Y5POZ6IEFZHJXL46OQ5HJ3WOKU/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterAratu Forests receives a second enforcement order application in five months. Thu, 05 Dec 2024 04:15:07 +0000 Aratu Forests received a new enforcement order application on Tuesday, just one day after it agreed on conditions for a previous enforcement order. Chief executive Neil Woods said the firm was pleased to have reached a settlement with the council, and was still working through the implications of the new application. Main photo / Warren Buckland
